MyDay Desktop - Version 1.0.2
================================

A modern task management and productivity application for Linux desktop.

FEATURES:
---------
✓ Task Management - Create, organize, and track tasks with priorities, tags, and subtasks
✓ Calendar Integration - Google Calendar sync with visual event indicators
✓ Notes System - Categorized notes with search and filtering
✓ Data Management - Backup/restore and export to CSV
✓ Modern UI - Card-based design with progress tracking
✓ Smart Features - Recurring tasks, holiday integration, week numbers

REQUIREMENTS:
-------------
- Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 17 or higher
- Linux operating system (tested on Fedora 42)
- 512MB RAM minimum
- 100MB disk space

INSTALLATION:
-------------
1. Extract this archive to your preferred location
2. Run: ./bin/myday

QUICK START:
------------
1. Launch the application using the launcher script
2. Create your first task list
3. Add tasks and organize them
4. Use the calendar to schedule activities
5. Take notes and categorize them
6. Back up your data regularly from Settings
